title: Component Definition
description: Defines the structure for a single component type definition file, specifying its ID and the schema for its data payload.

id.description: The unique, namespaced identifier for this component type (e.g., 'core:health', 'game:openable'). This is used as the key in an entity's component map.

description.description: A human-readable description of what this component represents or does.

dataSchema.description: A JSON Schema object defining the structure of the data this component holds. Can be an empty object schema for 'tag' components.
